pkgmetadata.longdescription: scMerge: Merging multiple batches of scRNA-seq data // Like all gene expression data, single-cell RNA-seq (scRNA-Seq) data suffers from batch effects and other unwanted variations that makes accurate biological interpretations difficult. The scMerge method leverages factor analysis, stably expressed genes (SEGs) and (pseudo-) replicates to remove unwanted variations and merge multiple scRNA-Seq data. This package contains all the necessary functions in the scMerge pipeline, including the identification of SEGs, replication- identification methods, and merging of scRNA-Seq data.
